problem:
VT=2 VS=float(random.randrange(5,10,1)) RL=float(random.randrange(10000, 15000, 100)) RON=1000 P = (((VS**2)/(RL+2*RON))+((VS**2)/(RL+RON)))*1000
Consider the following diagram:
Each MOSFET has a threshold voltage \(V_T\)=2V and an on resistance \(R_{ON}\)=1k\(\Omega\). Assume \(V_S=$VS\)V and \(R_1=R_2=$RL\Omega\).
What is the worst-case power (in milliWatts) consumed by this system?
